description: Try our easy to follow Pork Belly with Sticky Caramel Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pork Belly with Sticky Caramel Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Place pork belly in a roasting pan, rub skin with 2 tsp of the oil and sprinkle with salt. Roast for 1 hour or until crackling is crisp and meat is cooked. Transfer to a chopping board. Cover with foil to keep warm. Stand for 10 minutes before slicing.

Meanwhile heat remaining oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and cook for 3 minutes or until soft. Add garlic, ginger, chilli and chopped coriander roots and cook for 2 minutes. Add caster sugar and water. Stir until sugar dissolves and comes to the boil. Simmer for 10 minutes. Add fish sauce and lime juice.
Reduce heat and simmer for 2 minutes or until thickened. Spoon rice onto plates, top with pork and sauce. Serve with steamed greens and coriander.
